title: Zombie Merman
summaries: The Zombie Merman is an enemy that can be spawned by fishing in a Blood Moon. When the bobber dips and the player attempts to reel in a fish, a Zombie Merman or a Wandering Eye Fish has a chance to spawn within a few tiles of the bobber in place of a fish.

It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades. The Zombie Merman requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of its <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
